metadata.title: CVE-2021-32269 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac through 20200801. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function ilst_item_box_dump located in box_dump.c. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
